Should it no be politically correct for pupils in schools to dress as they please?
Some schools order girls to wear skirts. Should they not be allowed to dress in shorts or trousers?
It would be less homophobic to allow gay boys to dress in skirts and study with the girls. Likewise gay girls should be able to wear shorts or trousers and study with the boys.
Many pupils in our schools are gay or transexual, should we abandon homophobia in our schools and change with the enlightened times and let pupils decide?
This topic is overdue for discussion.
